backend/main.mo: Actor defining ponds, posts, ribbits, user profiles, likes, activity tracking, and storage with access control and view count logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping UI changes to affected frontend files and components with associated test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like list summarizing major frontend files and their roles in routing, layout, pages, components, and hooks.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file loading the app root and main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, theme provider, and global app structure.
frontend/src/components/BookmarkButton.t: Bookmark toggle button component using useBookmarks hook to mark lilies as saved.
frontend/src/components/CommentItem.tsx: Empty file placeholder for comment display component.
frontend/src/components/EmojiReactions.t: Empty file placeholder for emoji reaction component.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with navigation links and attribution section.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with navigation, search, pill‑shaped buttons, mobile menu, and avatar dropdown.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper with header, footer, and mobile sidebar drawer that closes on route changes.
frontend/src/components/LeftSidebar.tsx: Renders the left navigation sidebar with links and recent activity, highlighting the active route and loading activity items via queries.
frontend/src/components/LilyCard.tsx: Displays a lily post card with avatar, title, metadata, image handling, and interactions like liking and sharing.
frontend/src/components/MobileLeftSideba: Wraps the LeftSidebar in a mobile slide-in drawer with scroll locking and overlay behavior.
frontend/src/components/PondAboutSidebar: Shows detailed pond info including stats, moderators, join/leave actions, and visibility, with loading states.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/RibbitItem.tsx: Displays a ribbit comment with nesting, liking, replying, avatars, and timestamps using various backend queries.
frontend/src/components/RightSidebar.tsx: Shows trending ponds, popular tags, and popular recent posts derived from queries with loading states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Provides a React Query hook to create and manage a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refresh dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookmarks.ts: Manages bookmarked lily IDs using React state synced to localStorage with helpers to toggle, add, remove, and clear bookmarks.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating ponds, profiles, posts, and membership data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes, plus utility classes for UI consistency.
frontend/src/lib/formatNumber.ts: Formats large numbers into short readable units like k, M, and B.
frontend/src/lib/shareLily.ts: Shares a lily link using the Web Share API with clipboard and manual fallback options, showing toast notifications.
frontend/src/lib/user.ts: Manages local user data including username, user ID, Froggy Phrase handling, hashing, and settings backup/restore.
frontend/src/lib/viewCountCooldown.ts: Implements per-lily view cooldown tracking in localStorage to limit view count increments.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Static about page describing the platform, its features, and community guidelines.
frontend/src/pages/AllPondsPage.tsx: Lists all ponds with loading states, join status, and links to individual pond pages.
frontend/src/pages/CreateLilyPage.tsx: Form page for creating lilies with support for text, image, link types, ponds, tags, and validation.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePondPage.tsx: Form page for creating a new pond with images, froggy phrase validation, and submission handling.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home feed showing trending or new lilies with search support and sidebars.
frontend/src/pages/LilyPage.tsx: Displays a single lily with image, likes, views, ribbits, and form to submit new ribbits.
frontend/src/pages/PondAboutPage.tsx: Displays detailed information about a pond, including description, moderators, visibility, and membership actions with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/PondPage.tsx: Shows a pond’s feed with lilies, join functionality, sorting, and sidebars, handling loading and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/PostPage.tsx: Empty file placeholder for an individual post page.
frontend/src/pages/SavedLiliesPage.tsx: Lists locally bookmarked lilies with loading, removal, and missing-post handling.
frontend/src/pages/TagPage.tsx: Displays lilies filtered by tag with sorting, canonical tag redirection, and pond context.
frontend/src/pages/UserSettingsPage.tsx: Provides user settings including username changes, avatar upload, froggy phrase management, joined ponds, and admin tools.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme colors, spacing, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state schema, overall system summary, and a list of implemented frontend and backend features with IDs, descriptions, and versioning. Captures routing, UI components, theming, auth, sidebar behavior, discovery widgets, and other app capabilities for build planning.
